argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( x = (/) -> ( A +o x ) = ( A +o (/) ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( x = (/) -> ( ( A +o x ) e. On <-> ( A +o (/) ) e. On ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( x = y -> ( A +o x ) = ( A +o y ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( x = y -> ( ( A +o x ) e. On <-> ( A +o y ) e. On ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( x = suc y -> ( A +o x ) = ( A +o suc y ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( x = suc y -> ( ( A +o x ) e. On <-> ( A +o suc y ) e. On ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( x = B -> ( A +o x ) = ( A +o B ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( x = B -> ( ( A +o x ) e. On <-> ( A +o B ) e. On ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_oa0 | |- ( A e. On -> ( A +o (/) ) = A ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( A e. On -> ( ( A +o (/) ) e. On <-> A e. On ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_ibir | |- ( A e. On -> ( A +o (/) ) e. On ) |
| 12 |  | #P_suceloni | |- ( ( A +o y ) e. On -> suc ( A +o y ) e. On ) |
| 13 |  | #P_oasuc | |- ( ( A e. On /\ y e. On ) -> ( A +o suc y ) = suc ( A +o y ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( ( A e. On /\ y e. On ) -> ( ( A +o suc y ) e. On <-> suc ( A +o y ) e. On ) ) |
| 15 | 12, 14 | #P_syl5ibr | |- ( ( A e. On /\ y e. On ) -> ( ( A +o y ) e. On -> ( A +o suc y ) e. On ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_expcom | |- ( y e. On -> ( A e. On -> ( ( A +o y ) e. On -> ( A +o suc y ) e. On ) ) ) |
| 17 |  | #P_vex | |- x e. _V |
| 18 |  | #P_iunon | |- ( ( x e. _V /\ A. y e. x ( A +o y ) e. On ) -> U_ y e. x ( A +o y ) e. On ) |
| 19 | 17, 18 | #P_mpan | |- ( A. y e. x ( A +o y ) e. On -> U_ y e. x ( A +o y ) e. On ) |
| 20 |  | #P_oalim | |- ( ( A e. On /\ ( x e. _V /\ Lim x ) ) -> ( A +o x ) = U_ y e. x ( A +o y ) ) |
| 21 | 17, 20 | #P_mpanr1 | |- ( ( A e. On /\ Lim x ) -> ( A +o x ) = U_ y e. x ( A +o y ) ) |
| 22 | 21 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( ( A e. On /\ Lim x ) -> ( ( A +o x ) e. On <-> U_ y e. x ( A +o y ) e. On ) ) |
| 23 | 19, 22 | #P_syl5ibr | |- ( ( A e. On /\ Lim x ) -> ( A. y e. x ( A +o y ) e. On -> ( A +o x ) e. On ) ) |
| 24 | 23 | #P_expcom | |- ( Lim x -> ( A e. On -> ( A. y e. x ( A +o y ) e. On -> ( A +o x ) e. On ) ) ) |
| 25 | 2, 4, 6, 8, 11, 16, 24 | #P_tfinds3 | |- ( B e. On -> ( A e. On -> ( A +o B ) e. On ) ) |
| 26 | 25 | #P_impcom | |- ( ( A e. On /\ B e. On ) -> ( A +o B ) e. On ) |
